localjs.name: Local.js
localjs.description: Local.js is an Ajax-to-anywhere messaging library for Web applications. It sends HTTP-style messages to functions in the document, Web Workers, WebRTC Peers, data URIs, and public Web servers, structuring the components of the application into a unified SOA.
